steps.goal: Read all unread SMS messages. Use read_screen to collect all visible messages and copy them to clipboard.
Check the top 5 most recent chats. For each unread chat (bold name = unread), open it, use read_screen to collect messages, then go back. Copy a summary of all unread messages to clipboard.
Check the top 5 most recent chats with unread badges. Open each, use read_screen to collect messages, go back. Copy a summary to clipboard.
Read today's calendar events. Use read_screen to collect all events visible on today's view. Copy the schedule to clipboard.
Search for 'weather today' and read the result. Copy the weather summary (temperature, conditions, high/low) to clipboard.
